title: Tour de France 2013 stage 16 - Vaison-La-Romaine to Gap
description:
Tour de France 2013 stage 16 - Vaison-La-Romaine to Gap, 168 km.

Last 94km as broadcast by ITV4 in UK.

Split into parts at advert breaks to speed transcode and upload.

The flying VW bus appears at the end of part 4.


With the rest day done the Tour starts one of the hardest third weeks in memory. Here the race heads into the Alps on a day designed for a breakaway but the final climb of the Col de Manse is hard and the descent is even harder. Famous for Joseba BelokiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hip smash and Lance ArmstrongÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cyclo-cross, more recently we saw Andy Schleck dropped on the wet descent in 2011 and incidents like this will inspire some into risk-taking and others into caution.

(profile pic and description from inrng.com/tour/#Stage16)

SD broadcast, encapsulated 16:9, 576i, 25fps at ~2500kbps transcoded by ffmpeg/x264 to 576p with settings -c:v libx264 -crf 23 -preset veryfast -vf "yadif=0:-1:0" -c:a libfdk_aac -ab 64000 -ac 2.
